ERC721IncorrectOwner(address,uint256,add.details: Indicates an error related to the ownership over a particular token. Used in transfers.

params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.
params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC721InsufficientApproval(address,uint2.details: Indicates a failure with the `operator`s approval. Used in transfers.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC721InvalidApprover(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.

ERC721InvalidOperator(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC721InvalidOwner(address).details: Indicates that an address can't be an owner. For example, `address(0)` is a forbidden owner in ERC-20. Used in balance queries.

params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.

ERC721InvalidReceiver(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.

params.receiver: Address to which tokens are being transferred.

ERC721InvalidSender(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC721NonexistentToken(uint256).details: Indicates a `tokenId` whose `owner` is the zero address.

ERC721OutOfBoundsIndex(address,uint256).details: An `owner`'s token query was out of bounds for `index`. NOTE: The owner being `address(0)` indicates a global out of bounds index.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

params._airdropRewarder: The address of the airdrop rewarder

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

params.amount: The amount of tokens allocated to the creator
params.creator: The address of the creator

params._creatorAllocation: The new default creator allocation percentage

params._fee0: The amount of fee claimed for token0
params._fee1: The amount of fee claimed for token1
params._token: The token that the fee was claimed for

params.feeDestination: The address where fees will be sent

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.referralDestination: The address where referrals will be sent

params.adapter: The address of the adapter used to launch the token
params.params: The parameters used to launch the token
params.pool: The address of the pool for the token

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

returns.fee1: The claimed fees for the token

returns._2: The amount of tokens swapped if the user chooses to swap at launch

The token to get the launch parameters for

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._creatorAllocation: The new default creator allocation percentage

params._adapter: The adapter to set the value parameters for
params._token: The token to set the value parameters for

params._address: The address to toggle the whitelist for

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

AdapterSet(address,bool).notice: Emitted when an adapter is set

AirdropRewarderSet(address).notice: Emitted when the airdrop rewarder is set

CreatorAllocation(address,address,uint25.notice: Emitted when tokens are allocated to the creator

CronUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when the cron is updated

DefaultCreatorAllocationSet(uint256).notice: Emitted when the default creator allocation is updated

FeeClaimed(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a fee is claimed for a token

FeeUpdated(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when fee settings are updated

MetadataUrlUpdated(string).notice: Emitted when the metadata URL is updated

ReferralUpdated(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when referral settings are updated

TokenLaunched(address,address,address,(b.notice: Emitted when a token is launched

WhitelistUpdated(address,bool).notice: Emitted when a whitelist is updated

claimedFees(address).notice: Gets the claimed fees for a token

claimedFeesByCreator(address,address).notice: Gets the claimed fees by creator for a token

getDefaultValueParams(address,address).notice: Gets the value parameters for a token

getTokenAdapter(address).notice: Gets the adapter for a token

getTokenFee(address).notice: Gets the fee for a token

getTokenLaunchParams(address).notice: Gets the launch parameters for a token

getTotalTokens().notice: Gets the total number of tokens launched
